snippet.title: The Fading of Nicole Wilson - Official Gameplay Trailer | Nacon Connect 2025
snippet.description:
Meet Brit, check out gameplay, and get a glimpse into the horrors she'll find in this latest trailer for The Fading of Nicole Wilson, an upcoming story-driven folk-horror adventure game. The Fading of Nicole Wilson will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch.

Teenager Brit takes a ghost-hunting job at the eerie Timberline Hotel, hoping for fame. But when her employer is hospitalized, she must investigate alone. Armed with her camera and paranormal gear, she quickly realizes there are more dangerous forces at play than any supernatural entity.

#IGN #Gaming
